comment: Distinct elements of A270362. - _Jeffrey Shallit_, Mar 16 2016.
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..646
program: (PARI) fusc(n)=my(a=1, b=0); while(n, if(n%2, b+=a, a+=b); n>>=1); b
